meanings.definition: A device that increases the power output of an internal combustion engine.
meanings.sent1: The turbos in the car engine make it go faster.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic installed new turbos to boost the car's performance.
meanings.sent3: The little boy imagined tiny turbos inside his toy car making it zoom around.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm acted like turbos, propelling the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The turbos roared to life, sending the car speeding down the track.

meanings.definition: To increase the power output of an engine using a turbocharger.
meanings.sent1: He turbos his car to make it more powerful.
meanings.sent2: She decided to turbos her motorcycle for better speed.
meanings.sent3: The chef turbos the blender to quickly mix the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a vacation turbos his motivation to finish work early.
meanings.sent5: The wind turbos the sails, pushing the boat swiftly across the water.
